articles.title: Accel Leading Round for AI Startup n8n at $2.3 Billion Valuation
articles.summary: The venture capital firm Accel is leading a funding round for the German artificial intelligence startup n8n that would exponentially raise the valuation of the company to $2.3 billion, people familiar with the situation said.
articles.translated_title: Accel Leading Round for AI Startup n8n at $2.3 Billion Valuation
articles.translated_summary: The venture capital firm Accel is leading a funding round for the German artificial intelligence startup n8n that would exponentially raise the valuation of the company to $2.3 billion, people familiar with the situation said.

articles.title: An AI version of you could live forever
articles.summary: New developments in artificial intelligence are allowing people to live forever, via versions of themselves that can converse with the living through companies such as You, Only Virtual and StoryFile.
articles.translated_title: An AI version of you could live forever

articles.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT-5, promises 'PhD level expert' for all users
articles.summary: OpenAI launched on Thursday its GPT-5 artificial intelligence model, the highly anticipated latest installment of a technology that has helped transform global business and culture.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT-5, promises 'PhD level expert' for all users

articles.title: David Ellison Meets the Press
articles.summary: "We're ready to move past the noise," the CEO said, despite the lobbed questions geared toward Trump, '60 Minutes' independence, artificial intelligence and FCC maneuvering.
articles.translated_summary: "We're ready to move past the noise," the CEO said, despite the lobbed questions geared toward Trump, '60 Minutes' independence, artificial intelligence and FCC maneuvering.

articles.title: OpenAI releases GPT-5, a potential barometer for whether artificial intelligence hype is justified
articles.summary: OpenAI has released the fifth generation of the AI technology behind ChatGPT.

articles.title: OpenAI Launches More Powerful GPT-5 Model Aimed at Better Coding
articles.summary: OpenAI is rolling out a more powerful and long-awaited new artificial intelligence model called GPT-5, vying to stay ahead of increased competition from rivals in the US and China.

articles.title: Trump White House celebrates latest chapter of wins at 200-day mark
articles.summary: President Donald Trump celebrates 200-day milestone featuring passage of massive tax bill, trade deals, artificial intelligence advances and bombshell Russia probe documents.
articles.translated_title: Trump White House celebrates latest chapter of wins at 200-day mark

articles.title: Roblox opens up AI system that helps detect predatory language in chats
articles.summary: Roblox, the online gaming platform wildly popular with children and teenagers, is rolling out an open-source version of an artificial intelligence system it says can help preemptively detect predatory language in game chats.
articles.translated_title: Roblox opens up AI system that helps detect predatory language in chats
